website_summaries.verdict: Not sure how much weight you need? This set lets you adjust your weight as you build strength.
pros: Great for flexible workout options and storage
Can add or remove weight as needed
Includes two knurled bars, spin locks, four 0.5kg plates, four 1.25kg plates and four 2.5kg plates
cons: Plastic spinlocks are not that durable
Some sets arrive with pieces missing

customer_reviews.title: Rip-off prices!
customer_reviews.text: Decent dumbbells but at rip-off prices! Here's how much they used to cost: " York Fitness Cast Iron Dumbbell Set - 20kg Sold by: Amazon EU S.a.r.L. Return window closed on 22 Dec 2016 £34.99 Condition: New "
customer_reviews.author: Alex Day

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Wrost item I’ve ever bought. Missing two locks and one 0.5kg disc. The discs are dirty and some of them are rusted. What a terrible shopping experience and I have no idea how this rubbish got an overall rating above 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dong Zexuan

customer_reviews.title: Bought these in 2011, they still weigh 20kg and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in 2011, they still weigh 20kg and seem to be holding up well to very occasional use...
customer_reviews.author: M Whitman

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy them at current prices
customer_reviews.text: I bought these back in 2015 for £34.99 and they're still in good nick, easy to alter the weights but the spinlocks can be a bit stiff at first. However since the 'rona greedy individuals have been price-gouging and selling for more than 3 times the price. Do not buy at the current prices, as thy are not worth over £100.
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: Product fine, packaging TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: The actual weights are great, just what I wanted, however the packaging is TERRIBLE - I opened the door to the delivery driver to find the weights and box contents strewn all over my front door step (see photo) - the box is not strong enough. I had to ask him to wait while I checked everything to make sure it was all there. Good job I was in, I would have been mortified if he'd asked a neighbour to accept that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but two important things to know before you buy
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a year. The flexibility to switch out plates and gradually increment the weight per dumbbell is very useful. Just two things to keep in mind: 1) Doing overhead lifts is potentially dangerous as the metal bar ends could hit your head if you're tired. These aren't as safe to thrust above your head as the rubber-coated hex dumbbells, for example. 2) Each central bar + pair of spinlock collars comes to about 1.5kg each, so factor that in when picking weights. Overall a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: 2 weights missing and would be out of pocket to ...
customer_reviews.text: 2 weights missing and would be out of pocket to return it!!!! (read the comments, im not the only one) AVOID AVOID AVOID!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good weights - spoilt by plastic parts!
customer_reviews.text: Good set of weights, let down by the plastic spin lock collars. I did better than some of the other reviewers here, as mine fitted the bar, and work, but they are really cheap and nasty. I resolved this by buying replacement steel spin lock collars - they are about £3 a set (couldn't find them on Amazon though), and now they are a much better set of weights. £6 extra didn't break the bank, but it's disappointing that the cheap plastic ones are included as standard on these weights.
customer_reviews.author: markw

customer_reviews.title: This really is a cool set of weights
customer_reviews.text: This really is a cool set of weights, they are cast iron so you need not worry about leaking sand which is rather frustrating! They come well packaged and have a useful set of instructions which comes with a guide for various exercises you can undertake. York is a well known brand and produce quality products, this really is good value for money and you can add extra weights by buying other packs on amazon. If you have any questions, please feel free to ask I am happy to answer your queries.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Dawes

customer_reviews.title: Do You Even Lift?
customer_reviews.text: I've had a set of these York dumbbells for years and not had any problems. My eldest son is just getting into working out, so I got him a set of his own to stop him keep messing with mine. As several people have mentioned, the spinlock is plastic, which is a bit of a cheap move, but they fit fine. The plastic hand grip is relatively comfortable (I have another set with a metal grip and they're much harder on the hands). I have no qualms recommending these to anyone that wants to start lifting heavy s**t and building some muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Woden

customer_reviews.title: An uplifting experience.
customer_reviews.text: These weights are just what I expected so I’m delighted with them. Yes the threaded rod does protrude beyond the end of the locking nuts as mentioned in previous reviews along with the fact that the locking nuts themselves are made of plastic. I haven’t found either of those points an issue as the locking nuts are made of extremely chunky plastic and I have never experienced them working loose. I’m always aware of the protruding threaded rod ends when exercising so no problem. If there was I’d simply remove the excess with my angle grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Frank A.

customer_reviews.title: Finally arrived today after a hiccup and was disappointed to find the packaging was near destroyed and most ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally arrived today after a hiccup and was disappointed to find the packaging was near destroyed and most of the weights were dirty and scuffed. This I could excuse as they still do the job and they can just be cleaned. The biggest problem was that I had ZERO screw clamps included in the box so now I'll have to source myself 4 of those.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well how wrong can an Iron Dumbell Set be.
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner at weights and my old set were not challenging me enough. These are nice, solid bars, good weight selection. I kind of wish I had gone for the 30Kg set as with both bars loaded I am still pulling 20 reps before I get a bit worn down. So I will probably buy additional weights. The screws fittings are a lot better than on my smaller, plastic weights. Grips are comfortable and fit well in my hands. Nice solid product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sunderland

customer_reviews.title: 5 weights and 2 spinlocks missing.
customer_reviews.text: I received this today, opened the box and 5 of the 12 weights are missing and 2 of the 4 plastic spin locks are missing. I would not recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: danny henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, still using after 7 years
customer_reviews.text: Looknig on my amazon account I realised I bought these 7 years ago, and they've held up really well considering for a few of those years they were left outside in the bad weather! Have since brought them inside, still screw on great, weights still feel solid, and am using them every day is self isolation! Handy to have for a home work out, dumbbells are really versatile
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Conte

customer_reviews.title: Good Set of Dumbells
customer_reviews.text: These are a good set of tens. I greatly prefer cast iron weights to vinyl ones. The only thing I dislike about these are the plastic spin locks. The version of these I bought many moons ago have metal spin locks which have lasted for over fifteen years. It remains to be seen if the plastic ones have the same durability.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Danso

customer_reviews.title: Product fine, packaging terrible
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine, the rubber/plastic of the handles makes your hands smell a bit after you use them but other than that no issues. The packaging it came in was a disaster. The cardboard box was falling to pieces because it wasn't strong enough for the weight inside it and I think the weights had shifted in the box in transit.
customer_reviews.author: John Collett

customer_reviews.title: Great set but poor spinlocks
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set let down by rubbish plastic spinlocks. I have a different York 20kg set (which is now more expensive than this one - it most definitely didn't used to be!) with metal spinlocks, and those spinlocks are so much better. I actually prefer the bars from this set though as they have a really nice rubber grip.
customer_reviews.author: spleenharvester

customer_reviews.title: Great weights, but cheap plastic collars - Poor cost cutting from York
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in the past and sold them when moving house. They are weights and nothing to say really as cast iron quality. I've given this 4 stars though, as these ones I've recently bought have plastic collars and not metal chrome collars, as supplied previously. Very cheap on York for cutting costs. I've checked and to buy Chrome collars is £4.99 a pair.
customer_reviews.author: James Theaker

customer_reviews.title: Great set of dumbells but packaging in terrible condition
customer_reviews.text: Just got my set today and they are really good, well made and good quality, I would recommend them to anyone. But I gave them 3 stars because the condition of the packaging was terrible, the outside cardboard was ripped and damaged to such an extent that I am surprised nothing was missing as the discs and bars were basically falling out due to no substructure inside to keep the discs and bars in place.
customer_reviews.author: Nick K

customer_reviews.title: Terrible delivery and product.
customer_reviews.text: Failure all round. Parcel was basically destroyed by the time it arrived, 3 of the 4 spin locks were missing and over half the weight plates were also missing.
customer_reviews.author: ChaoticOrb

customer_reviews.title: Good weights, shoddy packaging/delivery
customer_reviews.text: Weights are fine, the rubber bit smelly. I knew these came with the plastic screws, but it's still disappointing how crap they are. Condition the package arrived in was poor. The box was battered to hell and back. Ok, so it's an 'industrial' type product, but doesn't mean it should arrive looking like it was airdropped without a parachute. The delivery person clearly couldn't be bothered to take them out of the van. Day off from work to receive these and got stiffed with a 'you weren't home when we called' slip.
customer_reviews.author: D H

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick.
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend spending a bit more from fitness superstore or something. The paint is almost chalky and leaves black smudges on hands. Plastic locks are quieter, although I am concerned about longevity. The grips are nice, though. They hold together well and do the job. Spend the extra £10-20 if you can to have something you won't be worrying about chipping or splintering. If you cant, these will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: pleased with my new weights
customer_reviews.text: Got these to replace my old sand filled weights, and as others have mentioned, as it is cast iron, it is smaller in size, but this serves to my advantage as its more compact. no problems with these so far. i weight train 4 times a week so these get some usage, and have not had any issues. my only gripe is that the actual bars seem to be thicker and made of a more rough material, so they do seem to irritate my hands after exercising. will probably have to purchase some gloves but apart from that, very happy with these weights. got them in the sale too so very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ava G

customer_reviews.title: rendering it completely useless as a Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: I received the weights in a tatty, oversized box, which was too soft, and clearly not fit for purpose. The re were three weight plates missing. 2 x 2.5 kg and 1 x 1.25kg, rendering it completely useless as a Christmas present. I did get a £12 refund from Amazon, but had to buy a different set from elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Richard O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not the best, I had to add some extra weight plates to it that I had lying around from an older dumbell set. Finally got my max weight on each dumbell to 16kg (with my extras added). Still, quite expensive of an item for the small amount of weight you get in it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, highly reccommended
customer_reviews.text: Quick Dispatch, and they are very easy to assemble and tighten, nice feel to them and good grip on bars. York is York so obviously a well known name but they are what i hoped for so i cant complain at all. Excellent product and nicely priced along with delivery
customer_reviews.author: stewart law

customer_reviews.title: The thing which needs to spin off frequently is made of plastic!
customer_reviews.text: I owned a set of these several years ago and I seemed to misplace them in a house move. I bought a new set of these from Amazon and everything looked perfect until I got to the spinlock collars....which were plastic?? What an odd design, everything else made of a metal except the collars. Mine went on ok but I would worry about unlocking them frequently, I can't see them lasting long. My old set had metal collars which were brilliant, why change the design? Cost I guess. For £35, I would have expected metal collars.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Packaging way below the standard required
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived yesterday, a day early. The product is a gift for someone and I am not qualified to comment on it's quality. However, it's packaging was a disgrace. Heavy weights in a flimsy cardboard box which had holes in it by the time it arrived with me. Two weights had escaped the box through one of the holes and were handed to us separately! The product does appear complete but you do need to strengthen your packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: One weight missing. Plastic ends not metal like in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 17Kg of Weights not 20Kg
customer_reviews.text: I get that the bars are 1.5kg each, but feel slightly cheated that you don't get 20kg of disc weights. The spindle locks are not well threaded and some of the plastic had to be shaved off and put on backwards to break through properly. Not happy that they are price gouging as well. 6 months ago they were almost 1/2 the price. Apart from that decent weights.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Feel better very quickly...!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent value. You know when they arrive because an exhausted postman knocks on your door, perspiring profusely! The weights arrived promptly and sturdily packaged in a cardboard box. You need to find a place to store them since they don't come with any sort of box. The only reason for the four stars is that the grips are quite hard on the hands. I'm a pianist and therefore a wuss but I think unless you're used to working with your hands, a few sore spots are inevitable. But these items have made me stronger, fitter and healthier. At this remarkable price, don't hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Paul Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awful Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an identical set several years ago, and the quality was great. The iron was smooth and the coating was great quality. However these are nowhere near as well manufactured. The cast is rough and full of faults and these ones are covered in a powder based paint (like they’re covered in soot, which rubs off on to your hands). They were also all scuffed due to poor manufacturing and lack of decent packaging. On a side note, I also purchased the EZ bar from York. It was thrown into a damaged, clear bag with no padding at all, so one of the collars was chipped upon arrival. Avoid this once well respected company.
customer_reviews.author: G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Bars and Collars
customer_reviews.text: In the picture you see a nice set of dumbbells, metal bars with a nice looking knurl and metal collars. What you get is a different story, you get a threaded bar with a plastic knurled sleeve which is very rough on your hands and plastic collars which take some effort to screw on and off. I wouldn't buy these again, I replaced the bars with some from Proiron and kept the plates. Chances are you will need to buy more plates too, the York 5kg plate set isn't bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: jmp esp

customer_reviews.title: Does the job right.
customer_reviews.text: Haha. Set them up with 2x2.5K and the bar weight. Sorted. If you need it, and you got the cash, buy it. EDIT: I like these weights. I use them every day. I imagine I always will. I used to have dumbbells years ago, and used them all the time. Don't know why I gave it up. These weights are actually surprisingly good looking, and I therefor proud of them. Regular light reps of maybe twenty, rather than sets of heavy weights doing eight reps.
customer_reviews.author: Mr

customer_reviews.title: they are comfortable and sufficient for a quick workout
customer_reviews.text: been my only form of weighted exercise at home for about a year now, they are comfortable and sufficient for a quick workout, the finish will come off after being battered for a while but it doesn't really matter, one little gripe is the collars are not metal like in the picture but in fact are plastic, the weights will come lose after a few minutes which may be annoying to some but honestly doesn't bother me, for the price they are great and I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: BVG

customer_reviews.title: Plastic lock nuts and surface rust from new.
customer_reviews.text: Came with the rubbish plastic lock nuts, quite annoying that it wasn't the vastly superior metal ones shown in the picture. The metal weights were also far from perfect with thin and chipped paint finish in some areas already resulting in surface rust. In fairness they're going to get knocked around in normal use, but from new they should have been in much better conditions. Lower star rating in order to highlight this to potential buyers...
customer_reviews.author: Topcat

customer_reviews.title: Much better than Vinyl weights.
customer_reviews.text: Having decided a pair of dumbbells was on the cards, I initially looked at vinyl weights since I've had some before, but luckily I spotted these. A bit more than I was intending to spend, but on offer at £34.99. What can I say? They're dumbbells! One slight disappointment is that the spinlock collars aren't metal, but grey plastic. They don't really spin as nicely as the metal ones, and on reflection I should have bought the boxed version of these, complete with metal collars and a carry case, for £5 more. I probably wouldn't pay any more for these, but at the price they're great value despite losing one star for the plastic collars.
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: Good kit
customer_reviews.text: Turned me from a mild mannered librarian to an Arnold Schwarzenegger lookalike- well a man can dream! Seriously they are easy to use and feel nice and solid. All you need is the willpower to use them
customer_reviews.author: NealB

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall good quality set ideal for amateur fitness at home good deal for £34.99 for cast iron dies not feel cheap. The grip is good it can be abrasive after long sets so gloves will be a bonus if you have baby skin lol. With the screw on stops it can be a bit tedious if you want to change weights between sets quick but overall a good purchase highly recommended if you want a decent dumbell set at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: MeinShaft

customer_reviews.title: Fab value weights
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Really pleased with these weights i received as a gift! I love the flexibility of amount of weight you can use. I'm toying with buying another set so I've got additional weights i can add (seems like great value way of adding weight).
customer_reviews.author: TootieBootie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter weights
customer_reviews.text: Good adjustable weights. Different sizes allow you to pick and choose the weight depending on what exercise youre doing. Only downside is a little uncomfortable after a long time but its not really an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Patrik Jones-Wright

customer_reviews.title: Really is a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: As far as weights go these are the cheapest, most well designed and simplistic barbells you can buy. However the ring that tightens the weights comes loose through usage. Not a real problem though as you can use your own tighteners if you wish. It's ideal for working out at home and has other variants of weight and size that are just as cheap. York barbells are some of the best.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kyle S. Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Does what weights do - fell nice in the hand but a few issues - upon ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what weights do - fell nice in the hand but a few issues - upon arrival one of the spin lock collars were missing meaning i had to purchase another set before I am able to use both Dumbells at the same time - another issue is that the end of the 1" thread are razor sharp, an idiot such as myself can easily cut themselves (Which i did) Overall the weights are nice for the price, i would assume the missing collar is a one off and you should have no other issues with this product, although my 3 star review; i would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Le

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is.
customer_reviews.text: A cast Iron dumbbell set. What is there to say. Since the time I bought them I have now almost completed my initial plan for them. Each dumbbell can be adjusted up to 10kg, and well they're good for beginners I guess. It's pretty easy to "run out of options" if one decides to build some upper body strength using just this set, however, as a means to get going to be able to progress to more challenging options it is well worth it. It is definitely a great way to get one's arms toned and as the upper weight of one dumbbell is 10kg it is more than suitable for females. Guys- look for other options.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Spinlocks
customer_reviews.text: I have a set just like this already (actually they came as part of a barbell set so there is more weight) that I bought about 15 years ago but I was a bit fed up of swapping plates around between sets so I thought I'd just get another set. I opened them as soon as they arrived but then promptly arranged for a return. Reason being that contrary to the picture these come with plastic spinlocks - bleugh, well they: a) Won't last long with cast iron plates b) Don't 'spin' very smoothly which is quite a disadvantage for a spinlock, slowing down plate changes.
customer_reviews.author: Sagat

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Quality Product From a Great Company
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality kit. Excellent company to deal with. One collar was damage, but they picked up and replaced the set in a heartbeat. Buy them. You won't be disappointed. They're excellent value, sturdy, proper cast iron, easy to change sets, incorporating excellent quality grips.
customer_reviews.author: James Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Only good for the novice lifter working out at home
customer_reviews.text: Only good for the novice lifter working out at home. I would expect an experienced lifter to choose a better range of weight sizes which would offer a more versatile set up. These are adequate for a new starter like me. They are a little abrasive on the hands when gripped so gloves a must when training. The plastic spinlocks have to be very tight or they can become loose when the full set of weights are attached when completing manoeuvres repeatedly. But otherwise a good collection of weights which can be adapted to suit and are interchangeable so no real fuss during a workout.
customer_reviews.author: Jazza

customer_reviews.title: They make lifting comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beginners and for anyone who wants to lift basically, the ergonomics are fantastic and it feels really comfortable holding them. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good quality solid iron
customer_reviews.text: Good quality solid iron. Love the flexibility and the fact that you can add more weight when needed. though on my previous set the screw on caps where made of metal these plastic ones seem to hold up ok. On heavier weights the bar texture is OK against your sin but I've head more comfortable verisons, they tried to include small pins to make the grip better but this has the effect of making them dig into your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Luca Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Simple, good value for money, very effective. Possibly worth buying a few more plates.
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a year now. Great for home workouts, smaller than some of the other Dumbbells around for the same weight. Probably worth grabbing a couple of extra plates for it though. Considering buying another set for myself to reduce the time spent changing the weight during workouts. Definitely go for cast iron. Must buy for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Let thy muscles grow
customer_reviews.text: A great product and easy to use, good quality. My only issue is sometimes the outer rubber seals stick to the cast iron weight and then I have to pry it off and reattach it to the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what i wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with the dumbells. Super nice quality cast iron weights and the grip in the middle is comfortable. One of my spin locks is a little stiff but the others are all perfect and they are really nice to use. Plates are really compact for their weight so nice and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Inflated covid prices to 1 side , Decent value for money compared to others.
customer_reviews.text: The hand grip is probably about 3omm diameter which i find better to hold than the 1" bars. I have to keep re tightening the spin locks quite frequently , but no different to others. I have had an identical set to these for about 2 years & the rubber type hand grips are still good on those.
customer_reviews.author: Mr John Wilby

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good for beginners looking to do some simple but effective weight training. The plates and bar are well constructed and strong, however; the three stars is due to the spin locks being plastic. After a few repetitions they begin to unscrew and you have to keep tightening them. If they become too loose it throws you off balance and ruins your form. I have been using these everyday and it's a great way to work up a sweat and build those summer arms :)
customer_reviews.author: Naeem Kabir

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Great Price !!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the quality of the dumbbells from York. Solid Cast Iron with great finish and mechanism. Screws are always secure which make sure they don't fall off accidentally. Happy to train with these as I feel they are even better than the Vinyl ones I used in my gym. And also, the price is so reasonable and is not a big hold in my pockets !!
customer_reviews.author: starrygirl

customer_reviews.title: packaging wasn't enough as yodel had to repackage my item ...
customer_reviews.text: packaging wasn't enough as yodel had to repackage my item. One of the handle's grip was broken at the edge on the lip tits the size where I can put my thumb in the gap it left in the lip. The spinlock collars also feel very cheap, they are just made of a light weight plastic, don't know if they are even solid and there is no rubber on them to keep them in place. The workout chart was also torn and was
customer_reviews.author: Ricki Duffield

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I think we all know that it is hard to gain muscle and loose fat. I think for a beginning weight user this product is perfect for you! They are adjustable and are suitable for anyone. If/when you gain the strength and you can start to lift high double figures you can just buy a new weight plate and slot it onto the bar and go. They are easy to use and they come very quickly. Some reviews may say that these weights come with missing plates, mine didn't and for that reason and many others I am giving this product five stars! I would recommend highly! James :)
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Trying to keep fit at an older age!
customer_reviews.text: As I am getting older l find that l am losing some of my muscle tone. I treated myself to these dumbbells so that I can have a gentle "workout" (not every day!) I have only had them a short time and I have started with two and a half kilograms on each dumbell. So far so good. I will never reach Charles Atlas (sorry....showing my age!) status but every little helps.
customer_reviews.author: geoffk

customer_reviews.title: Fast replacement
customer_reviews.text: I was initially disappointed with the vinyl spin-off nuts which were provided but these actually provide a much more secure hold than the original steel nut+rubber washer kind. The first order I received had an issue with one of the 0.5kg plates not fitting on the bar. The iron casting around the hole was not filed down sufficiently, causing the bar to get stuck. A replacement was requested on the Thursday and arrived on the Saturday. Amazon then collected the faulty item on the Monday, meaning I was still about to use the weights without the 0.5kg plates. I've had no issues whatsoever with the replacement and will be ordering some more shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Jonni Thurling

customer_reviews.title: Missing discs
customer_reviews.text: Product was missing 2 x 0.5g discs. Not worth carrying to post office to get a replacement so will grumpily make do Obviously York have no quality control (how easy would it be to weigh?) so replacement might have more items missing anyway. Don't deserve to have anything to do with Yorkshire in their name.
customer_reviews.author: flashmg

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great to use.
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be helping but have noticed the part that keeps the 'weights' together sometimes comes undone a bit so have to re-tighten it sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Guilty Spark

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set of weights, you get 2 bars with 4 end stoppers, and a decent selection of plates. The grips are quite harsh and leave your hands smelling like rubber. This isn't really a problem as after washing your hands they are back to normal, and gloves are an option. Good, well made dumbbell set that provides a huge variety of exercises to build muscle, also, they're quite heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great Price For Convenient Light Dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: Great set of dumbbells for general training. Unfortunately, for key lifts you'll move up the weights quite quickly and soon these won't be heavy enough to create the right overload. They are, however, great for certain movements like side-lateral raises where heavy weights can cause injury. I've even taken the weights off, slipped the dumbbell in a resistance band hanging from a pullup bar and performed tricep pulldowns. Overall they're a solid pair of dumbbells that will be useful in anybody's home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson Athletics & Fitness

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Components aren't as bad as people make out
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are really really great weights. The plastic components aren't the best but they aren't as bad as people have made out, one of them I got is a little tricky to twist back on but that is it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: 3 star for two reasons 1 I hate nylon spin locks 2 you can get 30kg sets same price advise look through what's available. Apart from that their not to bad but just consider how much 10kg would cost to add and the set I seen had metal spinlocks.
customer_reviews.author: TheStig

customer_reviews.title: Going from strength to strength
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! I needed to get fit and healthy ( and lose weight!!!). Found an exercise routine on Internet using barbells. The York Fitness dumbbell adjustable set has been brilliant. After a few weeks I can see and feel the difference. As I am getting stronger, it has been easy to add the extra weight plates. The plastic spin locks are quick to use, and I have found that they do not become loose while exercising.
customer_reviews.author: Sam D

customer_reviews.title: A great set of dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit of a beginner when it comes to weights, and wanted a decent set that would see me through home workouts for a good while. These are more than adequate. Whilst the grip is a little rough, it definitely helps. I had worried the plastic collars may be a bit flimsy, but they seem to be well made and I have had no problems at all with them. I found the wall chart especially helpful as it gives advice on which exercises to do to target various areas of the body, so I've been able to structure my workouts well.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mcmullan

customer_reviews.title: Strong good build
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase, cheaper then Argos and also delivered for free. Currently sitting under my bed as been too lazy to use them. If you found this review helpful then please click on the 'helpful' button below. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Nils

customer_reviews.title: For better health
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable weight options with a nice grip. (Need to be tightened very often, though.) I'm doing 8kg variable exercises with both arms almost every day. (8+8=16). Feel healthier, and recommend. Easy to adjust to your requirements. Comes with a nice storage box.
customer_reviews.author: duck010

customer_reviews.title: Wisely
customer_reviews.text: If you use these in a professional way you will within months have a very athletic physique. Heavy weights produce bulky muscles, these will combine strength, stamina and suppleness - to good degrees. Good value, varying resistances etc. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. I've seen a few bad reviews based on the spin locks. But personally i have no issues. Yes they become loose after so long. But i can't really factor that in, they are designed after all to come on and off so naturally, they lose their grip after so long. Comes with a good set of weights to interchange between, changing weights is easy and no hassle. Have good grip on the bars and the weights are excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grips!
customer_reviews.text: Worth it for the dumbbell bars alone. Absolutely fantastic grips, way better than any i've used in gyms or at home. I'd definitely get some more weight discs in addition to this though, as 10kgs will not take you far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: York is the business!
customer_reviews.text: These dumbbells are great, Very well made and easy to setup and swap weights around due to the lock nuts provided. I have been using them every day in short bursts when i get home from work and can already see results. York are a high quality manufacturer and im pleased with the price on this product for 2 complete weights. Good quality and a great purchase. Would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: James Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Effectively useless for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with only three collar nuts. Effectively useless for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: I. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice piece of sport equipment
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a shame that it is only 20Kg, but i think it is more than enough. Build quality is very good. Dumbbells do feel quite nice in your hands. I was a bit scared about the plastic locks on the back, but they seem to do their jobs just fine. Another great thing about them is their price. Overall a nice addition to the home gym. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Nikolai Lavrov

customer_reviews.title: Good set.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these sets over the years. Previous model was pure metal and had no hand grips. This version has hand grips and plastic screws. Plastic screws are a pain as they take longer to put on and off (not as smooth rotation motion) however the grips are welcome as the previous version did flake the silver coating relatively easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Tyrrell

customer_reviews.title: Fit for purpose
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous basic set of weights. Sturdy and comfy to use. The bolts do loosen but not drastically so just check they're tight before you start and you'll be fine. If you use them a lot, the bar is rough so gloves are handy even if they aren't particularly heavy
customer_reviews.author: Miss E. Price

customer_reviews.title: they are really easy to change the weights with the tough plastic screw ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my son's 16th birthday, they are really easy to change the weights with the tough plastic screw on end Cap. Nice and comfortable but grippy to hold. Good beginners weights. Both he and myself like to use the especially in conjunction with a weight bench.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: product got delivered within 2 days after selecting super saver delivery which was brilliant! cannot fault the weights, the do what they say on the tin however i find the bar very uncomfortable to grip, almost like they will give you blisters after a while so gloves might be useful. i just tied a pair of pink socks around it to make it more comfortable and pretty. if they changed the grip to be smooth i would have given them 5 stars. also i dont see the difference between the plastic and metal screw thing that holds the weights together. the plastic works good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant, Seller fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant, Seller fantastic, delivered so quickly. Delivery man so strong he carried the package into the hallway like a packet of tea, so when I went to pick the parcel up nuff said! Great weights good quality
customer_reviews.author: Frinbo

customer_reviews.title: Good but not 20kg
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are excellent weights. Solid enough, all fits together securely and does the job. Not overly bulky either, unlike some cheaper weight sets. Loses a star for the bars being underweight. Actual cast iron weights are as described but overall set weighs 19kg ie each dumbbell weighs 9.5kg.
customer_reviews.author: L Yates

customer_reviews.title: Worth it. But need gloves.
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend gloves. The handles are quite abrasive. But very solid weights for any level. I use them at home when I’m not able to get to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Brook

customer_reviews.title: Slightly uncomfortable but worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: These weights are slightly uncomfortable but not the end of the world. All in all good quality and good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Cheap, Versatile
customer_reviews.text: There's not a whole lot to say about these. The grips are quite good - other than the seam which sometimes irritates your hand. The plates come in enough variety that you'll be able to slowly progress up to the whole 10/20kg. The biggest issue with these dumbbells are the plastic spinlocks which come loose every now and then - not enough to be of any danger, but just require a quick re-tightening every few sets.
customer_reviews.author: Mr The Beard

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with them and would highly recommend them to anyone ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these since June 2016 and I'm very impressed with them. They are well constructed and are very versatile. I have been using them for a range of exercises and they've never let me down. Very pleased with them and would highly recommend them to anyone who wants to work out at home and see results.
customer_reviews.author: RJH1980

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived within 2 days from dispatch. Box was not damaged and everything inside was packed correctly. The product is a good purchase for the value, everything seems sturdy. Includes a Chart and some exercises you can do along with what they target. Also you do not get 20 KG weights you get about 18 KG this is because the spin lock bars are about 1 KG each which adds up to the 20 KG Note: Some people have complained about the plastic collars but The plastic collars really don't bother me. They tighten perfectly and don't budge.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Janet E. M. Bogunovic

customer_reviews.title: Good old fashioned weights
customer_reviews.text: A neat set of weights, simple and adjustable with double of everything so you can mirror or have uneven weights for each. Comes with a nice wall chart to get you started. They're nicely made, the grip on the handles is effective and cross-hatched out of a rubberised coating and my only gripe is that the plastic nuts that hold the weights on tend to work a little loose after a few reps, this isn't a major problem though.
customer_reviews.author: Robot_Boy

customer_reviews.title: Good value and excellent dummbells
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as an addition to some home gym equipment. The dumbells are good build quality. The grip is good and doesn't slip we wet or sweaty and the spin locks don't move when secured. Room for additional plates - could probably get close to 30kg on each dumbell with the right sized plates. Item was delivered quickly. Plates were a little oiled so required wiping down before use but all in all a happy customer and would use again.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great set - easy to use and interchangable.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of dumbells. Bought these to augment another set I own. Be careful with the plastic ends as they can get a bit chewed up in the threads. York seem to have changed the grip on the bars as they are much better now - with a deeper groove. They do have a tendancy to work themselves loose - so you need to retighten them after a few reps.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hall

customer_reviews.title: just disappointed I am having to expend further cost to achieve ...
customer_reviews.text: Received today in packaging which appeared to have retained it's integrity so all items present. Unfortunately one of the plastic spin lock collars does not fit (must assume this is a manufacturing defect), rendering one dumbbell redundant . The bars and weights appear robust and I have no doubt will prove their worth when I am able to use them, just disappointed I am having to expend further cost to achieve this end.
customer_reviews.author: Quieteye

customer_reviews.title: Made In China
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but like everything I seem to buy these days, made in China. Do we make anything in the UK anymore!? Too much plastic in the packaging too.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love these Dumbells
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these already, and this one is identicle,with the same slightly bigger diameter grip which I like and nice assortment of weights.One of the end bars is badly finished off but when using one of my spare metal twist locks there was no problem putting it on or off,while the light duty plastic one had to be bedded in because of the aforementioned badly finished end, which could do with a bit of filing,but I am not going to bother.Great price,I'm keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: shakespear1599

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money, but plastic spinlocks
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold, weights are accurate (I weighed the discs and they're within a few ounces of their proclaimed weights) but plastic spinlock collars are downright useless. I'm constantly tightening them and more than once I've almost brained myself during bench presses due to this. It's just not safe. Go with the same set, but in the case. They come with metal spinlock collars. I don't know why they haven't just banned plastic ones to be honest. I'm going to replace mine.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Good weights.
customer_reviews.text: Don't have a comfy handle but they are okay. Can't complain honestly, they do their job and they are customisable which is great if you don't want to buy loads of different sizes weights.
customer_reviews.author: •bitterblossom•

customer_reviews.title: ... plastic one's filled with sand but these are much better as they are cast iron and the equivalent weights ...
customer_reviews.text: My last set of dumbbells were the plastic one's filled with sand but these are much better as they are cast iron and the equivalent weights are therefore smaller and less awkward. The plastic tightening screws are better than metal ones as the seem to stay tighter for longer. Pay the extra cash and buy a cast iron dumbbell set.
customer_reviews.author: Daz Mack

customer_reviews.title: These are great (after a week!)
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty disappointed when these arrived new from Amazon and 3 of the spin lock collars didn't fit. However, a quick e-mail to York (yorkhelp@yorkfitness.co.uk, not helpdesk@yorkfitness.co.uk as the documents in the box say) and they had 3 collars in the post. They've arrived now and they fit perfectly. It's a shame that a lot of these weights seem to arrive with broken collars but York are great at replacing them (well, in my case at least!)
customer_reviews.author: JF Amzn

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price - great mix of different weights. The rubber handle is the best part of this. It's really comfortable and you probably won't need to wear weight lifting gloves with these. 4 stars as for some reason the rubber handle has a REALLY strong smell of rubber, and after a few months use, it still smells.
customer_reviews.author: J Hanamichi

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for in home gym usage. Carrying case isn't the best, but no complaints about the weights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: The dumbells themselves are well machined, the tightning screws stay in place, and the whole set feels well made. In agreement with a reviewer below, the rubber on the grips is a great feature as it reduces wear on the hands that metal grips would produce. The only drawback is that it comes in a simple card box, so have a place in mind to store the unused weights and dumbells themselves as it does not come with storage. Does come with a handy excercise poster, however.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Valentine

product_meta.title: York Fitness 20 kg Cast Iron Spinlock Dumbbell - Adjustable Hand Weights Set (Pack of 2) - Black
product_meta.description:
The York 20kg (44lbs) black cast iron dumbbell set is a perfect choice for those looking for multiple weight workout options. It allows for targeting chest, bicep, arm, triceps and back muscles. This versatile dumbbell set includes four 0.5kg (1.1lbs) discs, four 1.25kg (2.75lbs) discs, four 2.5kg (5.5lbs) discs, four spinlock collars and two 14" chrome spinlock bars.

SET CONTAINS:
4 x 0.5kg Discs
4 x 1.25kg Discs
4 x 2.5kg Discs
4 x Spinlock Collars
2 x 14 inch Chrome Spinlock Bars
1 x Workout Chart
feature_bullets: Adjustable hand weights set for strength training in the gym
York dumbbell workout guide included for home fitness
Black 20 kg cast iron dumbbells with 4 premium heavy-duty spinlocks prevent the plates rattling and provide secure workout
2 x York 14” Chrome Spinlock Dumbbell bars; York Cast Iron weight plates = 4 x 0.5 kg, 4 x 1.25 kg, 4 x 2.5 kg

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
